verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> you in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble!<s%> May the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7682>set<s%> you [securely] on <S%H7682>high!<s%>
May He <S%H7971>send<s%> you <S%H5828>help<s%> from the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> And <S%H5582>support<s%> you from <S%H6726>Zion!<s%>
May He <S%H5414>grant<s%> you your heart's desire, And <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6098>counsel!<s%>

We will <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> over your <S%H3444>victory,<s%> And in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> we will <S%H1713>set<s%> up our <S%H1713>banners.<s%> May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4862>petitions.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3467>saves<s%> His <S%H4899>anointed;<s%> He will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him from His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> With the <S%H3468>saving<s%> <S%H1369>strength<s%> of His <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand.<s%>
<S%H428>Some<s%> <S%H2142>[boast<s%>] in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H428>some<s%> in <S%H5483>horses;<s%> But we will boast in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
They have <S%H3766>bowed<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> But we have <S%H6965>risen<s%> and <S%H9388>stood<s%> <S%H9388>upright.<s%>
<S%H3467>Save,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> May the <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> us in the <S%H3117>day<s%> we <S%H7121>call.<s%>
